Articles.Content:
Never touched Jool, so a lot is missing.

Of note: Asteroid rendezvous and rover: Docked two Class E together and had the engineer drive a rover over them. Built a truly massive mining base on Minmus. The first crew to Moho vanished without trace along with the craft. Ike Jumperlab, a mobile base. A massive base-train on Mun. 2/3 of the way circumnavigating Duna. Landed a class E asteroid on Kerbin.
What is this ribbon you speak of

8 hours ago, RX2000 said:

What is this ribbon you speak of

It's some vanity item from kerbaltek.com. I tried to explore what it is, suspecting that they are generated by some achievement tracking mod, but in reality they are generated by some sort of editor on that website.

The ribbons are down at the bottom of my post.

Also, all the confusion for my Sun and Jool ribbon, I did the resource thing to defy logic.

20 hours ago, Sharpy said:

Never touched Jool, so a lot is missing.

Of note: Asteroid rendezvous and rover: Docked two Class E together and had the engineer drive a rover over them. Built a truly massive mining base on Minmus. The first crew to Moho vanished without trace along with the craft. Ike Jumperlab, a mobile base. A massive base-train on Mun. 2/3 of the way circumnavigating Duna. Landed a class E asteroid on Kerbin.

 

Oh, I saw you over at KerbalTek! I saw your Ribbon!
